EmailTemplate.name: Cancellation Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Cancellation Letter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Opportunity.CreatedDate}
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
Thank you for considering St Andrew's Cathedral School for {!Opportunity.Student_Name__c}'s education and development. I am sorry to learn you will not be proceeding with his/her enrolment application.
I would like to take this opportunity to wish {!Opportunity.Student_Name__c} every success for his/her future endeavours. If during his/her schooling you find his/her needs are not being met, please do not hesitate to contact me again if I can be of any assistance.
Your Sincerely
Bruce Perry BEd, Dip Teach Registrar
(For)
